Powered by Cookiebot

  * Consent

## We Value Your Privacy

Review our Privacy Policy here. We use cookies to help the website to
function, enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and
analyze our traffic. Please select your cookie preferences.

Consent Selection

 **Necessary**

**Preferences**

**Statistics**

**Marketing**

Customize

  * Necessary  38

Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like
page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot
function properly without these cookies.

    * Affirm

4

Learn more about this provider

 **affirm-csrf-token** Ensures visitor browsing-security by preventing cross-
site request forgery. This cookie is essential for the security of the website
and visitor.

**Expiry** : Session **Type** : HTTP

 **DUMMY_COOKIE** Necessary for the website’s payment-plan-function upon
checking out.

## What is Functional Medicine?

As a catalyst in the transformation of healthcare, functional medicine takes a
comprehensive, whole health approach to prevention, health, and well-being;
treats root causes of disease; and restores healthy function through a
personalized patient experience — all while being a vital partner to
conventional medicine.

The functional medicine model

## Annual International Conference

Expert speakers will provide compelling new perspectives for optimizing health
at every level of care. Discover the latest medical innovations and advances
in clinical research that present new opportunities for transformative care.
Join us at AIC!  
  
**IFMCP Exclusive Rate and Tier One Pricing Ends Soon >**

Explore AIC

### Our Functional Medicine Certification Program

IFM supports the confident and competent practice of functional medicine by
providing high-quality education and certification programs, training, and
resources. We are the only organization providing functional medicine
certification along with educational programs directly accredited by the
Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCME). IFM Certified
Practitioners are consistently recognized as the most thoroughly trained and
tested functional medicine clinicians in their fields and the most sought-
after by both patients and employers.

Get Certified

### IFM-Trained Practitioners

#### The most in-demand and respected in the field

Explore CME eligible and Non-CME courses designed to enhance your practice.

Learning Center

IFM Certified Practitioners are highly sought-after by the top medical
institutions in the US.

Find Out More

Our educational programs are developed by the premier thought leaders in the
industry.

Our Educators

## Find a practitioner

Our Find A Practitioner tool is the largest referral network in functional
medicine, created to help patients locate functional medicine practitioners
anywhere in the world. IFM Certified Practitioners are listed first in the
search results, given their extensive education.

Find a practitioner  
See our full list of IFM practitioners
